title: Evaluation accuracy, repeatability and performance of Galileo and Beidou positioning in Antarctica region

abstracts.content: Growing activities in the Antarctica call for more navigation and positioning services in this region. The current GNSS (Global Navigation Satellite System) constellations, which have the capability of fully global positioning services, consist of GPS, GLONASS, Galileo and BeiDou. At higher latitudes, GNSS signal degradation due to ionospheric activity is more pronounced. The more precise phase-based positioning modes are particularly vulnerable to ionosphere disturbance such as scintillations. Elevated ionospheric activity can cause a loss of precise-positioning mode or, in more extreme cases, a total loss of signal lock. Monitoring the movement and evolution of ice shelves and glaciers as well as geodetic prospecting requires highly precise positioning. Galileo-only static processing (OPUS-Beta) can provide millimetre-to-centimetre accuracy for the long baselines in this study.

title: Losy polskich pilotów wojskowych, którzy służyli w trzech armiach

abstracts.content: Życiorysy polskich pilotów wojskowych pierwszej połowy XX w. niekiedy były bardzo zawiłe, gdyż przyszło im służyć w swoim czasie w trzech różnych formacjach zbrojnych. Los oraz zawierucha wojenna sprawiły, że reprezentowali różne państwa. Dotyczy to niezbyt licznej populacji naszych pilotów, ale kilkudziesięciu udało się zidentyfikować i przedstawić ich niekiedy bujne życie zawodowe w krótkiej notatce biograficznej. W materiale ujęto zaledwie kilka sylwetek, tj.: Henryk Franczak, Roman Hrycak, Stanisław Karpiński, Bronisław Malinowski, Jan Zbigniew Mikulski i Wacław Ulass. We wszystkich tych życiorysach daje się zauważyć profesjonalizm, patriotyzm, poświęcenie, męstwo i oddanie sprawie polskiej.

The biographies of Polish military pilots from the first half of the 20th centur y were sometimes very complicated, as they had to serve in three different armed formations at the time. Fate caused the turmoil of war in such a way that they represented various countries. This applies to a small population of our pilots, but dozens have managed to identify and present their sometimes lush professional life in a short biographical note. Only a few figures are included in the material, ie: Henryk Franczak, Roman Hryczak, Stanisław Karpiński, Bronisław Malinowski, Jan Zbigniew Mikulski and Wacław Ulass. In all these biographies professionalism, patriotism, dedication and dedication to the Polish cause can be noticed.

title: Performance Measurements System of Propellers for Electric Propulsion

abstracts.content: This paper presents the construction of a laboratory test stand for measuring the static thrust of electric propulsion units. A listing of all components used for the stand is made, and the operation of electronic components and electrical connections necessary for the operation of the stand is described. The possibilities of using the stand are described, and example results from tests of the drive unit are included. The stand allows plotting the electrical characteristics of the drive units. The recorded results provide information on thrust, torque, supply voltage, current, engine speed, speed controller temperature and drive engine temperature.

abstracts.content: This paper deals with the design, preparation and manufacture of a model aircraft for wind tunnel testing. The project was based on a twin-engine aircraft of Austrian design Diamond DA42. Based on technical drawings, a model of this aircraft was made in a CAD environment. The next step was to adapt the design to divide it into parts for printing and incorporate elements to strengthen the structure and attach it to the force balance. The fabrication of the model was done by 3D printing from PLA material using FDM technology. The dimensions of the model were adjusted to the size of the wind tunnel measurement space. The model omitted aircraft structural elements such as propellers and landing gear. The entire model was adapted to be mounted on a 6-component force balance. After the model was printed, finishing work was carried out. For the final version of the model, wind tunnel tests were conducted. The work was supplemented with a description of the test stand and the results of the tests carried out.

title: Autogyro Main Rotor Blade Strength Tests

abstracts.content: The paper presents the preliminary results of numerical analysis and strength tests of the composite blade of a autogyro main rotor. The conducted tests made it possible to verify the developed design in terms of ensuring safety during flight. Example test results of the blade made of three layers of carbon-epoxy composite (CFRP) in [45/0/-45] configuration are presented. The behavior of the blade under a given load was investigated. The displacement and failure rate of the composite material were analyzed using the finite element method. Testing on a test machine made it possible to analyze the displacement due to a given load. In addition, the form of damage that occurred for the maximum value of the breaking force was analyzed. Complementing the conducted tests was the analysis of the blade deformation using the digital image correlation method. The developed geometry of the blade, combined with the defined material configuration, showed high load resistance in the form of lifting force, drag force and centrifugal force.

title: Evaluating the efficacy of full-scale and tabletop exercises in enhancing paramedic preparedness for external disasters: A quasi-experimental study

abstracts.content: Background: The increasing frequency and severity of disasters worldwide needs effective disaster management training to enhance the preparedness and response capabilities of emergency responders. This study compares the outcomes of tabletop exercises (TTEs) and full-scale exercises (FSEs) in training senior paramedic students at Prince Sultan bin Abdul Aziz College for Emergency Medical Services, King Saud University, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Methods: A nonequivalent two-group quasi-experimental design was used. Forty-five senior paramedic students who had completed a disaster management course were randomly assigned to either TTE or FSE groups. Both groups participated in a simulated multi-vehicle accident scenario. Data were collected using an adapted CLUT Scale survey, which measured learning, trust, and usefulness immediately after the exercises. The Mann–Whitney U test was applied to compare outcomes between the 2 groups. Results: Both TTE and FSE resulted in high levels of perceived learning, trust, and usefulness among participants, indicating a positive impact on disaster preparedness. While the TTE group scored slightly higher on average across all variables, these differences were not statistically significant, suggesting that both exercise types are similarly effective. The findings underscore the cost-effectiveness of TTEs and their potential to foster collaborative learning environments Conclusions: Both TTE and FSE are effective in enhancing disaster preparedness among senior paramedic students. Given their adaptability and cost-effectiveness, TTEs may be particularly valuable for resource-constrained training settings. Further research with larger, more diverse samples and pre-/post-intervention assessments is recommended to validate these findings and improve disaster management training programs.

Impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on the mental health of Nursing students: A systematic review and meta-analysis

abstracts.content: Background: There is an increased prevalence of mental health problems in various population groups as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic and its consequences, especially regarding anxiety, stress, depression, fear, and sleep disturbances, require to be investigated longitudinally. Objective: This study aimed to determine the impact that the COVID-19 pandemic had on the mental health of Nursing students, as well as to examine other associated factors such as anxiety, fear, sleep disturbances, and coping strategies. Method: This systematic review and meta-analysis were designed following the PRISMA guidelines and were registered in PROSPERO with code CRD42024541904. PubMed, Web of Science, CINAHL, and Scopus electronic databases were utilized. Keywords indexed in the MeSH thesaurus were used (COVID-19, nurs* student and mental health), following the Condition Context Population (CoCoPop) strategy. A total of 3866 studies were obtained of which 36 were selected for inclusion in the review. The Joanna Briggs Institute critical appraisal tool was used to assess the methodological quality of the selected studies, all of which were cross-sectional, finally including those with a cutoff point equal to or greater than 4 out of 8. Results: The prevalence of total anxiety was found to be 33.6% in the meta-analysis. For depression, the prevalence was 37.92%, and for stress, it was 52.46%. The results of this study show increased levels of stress, anxiety, depression, fear, and sleep disturbances among Nursing students that coincide with the different waves of the pandemic, changes in the study methodology, and the increase or decrease in reports of cases of infection. A relationship is observed between variations in these variables and the implementation of protective measures and vaccinations in different countries. Conclusion: As the pandemic progressed, hygiene and prevention measures became more effective, and the lethality of the virus decreased. The prevalence of the negative psychological effects also decreased from the onset in 2020 until the end of 2022. Due to the impact of the pandemic on global health, preventive measures should include personal, family, emotional, economic, educational, professional, and mental health approaches.

title: Lotniczy monitoring ekologiczny polskich obszarów morskich

otherTitles.title: Ambient air monitoring of Polish maritime areas

abstracts.content: Jednym z podstawowych zagrożeń o charakterze pozamilitarnym dla polskich obszarów morskich są zagrożenia ekologiczne, w tym zanieczyszczenie morza. Morze Bałtyckie, chociaż położone na uboczu głównych szlaków żeglugowych, posiadając charakter akwenu półzamkniętego, wchłania znaczne ilości różnego typu zanieczyszczeń. Lotnictwo Marynarki Wojennej RP wśród swoich zadań w czasie pokoju posiada realizację lotniczego monitoringu polskich obszarów morskich, utrzymując przy tym specjalnie wyposażony, wyspecjalizowany sprzęt lotniczy i wyszkolony personel. Celem rozdziału była analiza potrzeb w tym zakresie, zadań realizowanych przez lotnictwo MW oraz ocenę możliwości realizacji tego zadania

One of the basic non-military threats to Polish sea areas are ecological threats, including sea pollution. The Baltic Sea, although located off the main shipping routes, has the character of a semi-enclosed body of water and absorbs significant amounts of various types of pollution. Among its tasks in peacetime, the Naval Aviation has the implementation of aerial monitoring of Polish sea areas, while maintaining specially equipped, specialized aviation equipment and trained personnel. The aim of the article is to analyze the needs in this area, the tasks carried out by the MW aviation and to assess the possibility of implementing this task

title: Multirole tanker transport - przyszłość lotnictwa transportowego w Polsce

otherTitles.title: Multirole tanker transport – the future of air transport in Poland

abstracts.content: Siły Powietrzne naszego kraju stojąc w obliczu perspektywy dopasowania w najbliższych latach systemu zarządzania zasobami oraz wsparciem misji pod kątem implementacji samolotu Lockheed Martin F-35, muszą dokonać gruntownej ewaluacji w zakresie możliwości wsparcia nowej platformy bojowej. Jedną z realnych możliwości wydaje się być tzw. Multi-Role Tanker Transport. W tym przypadku uzyskanie zdolności do tankowania w powietrzu oraz szybkiego transportu strategicznego w korzystnych warunkach, rozszerzone o ewakuację medyczną, wydaje się warunkiem koniecznym w celu optymalnego wykorzystania bojowego samolotu F-35 oraz dopasowania krajowych zdolności do wyzwań nowoczesnej wojny. Rozdział ma na celu analizę potrzeb w tym zakresie oraz ocenę funkcjonujących w NATO i Unii Europejskiej wielonarodowych programów tego typu przez pryzmat udziału w nich Sił Powietrznych RP.

The Polish Air Force, facing the prospect of adjusting the resource management system and mission support in the coming years in terms of the implementation of the Lockheed Martin F-35 aircraft, must thoroughly evaluate the possibility of supporting the new combat platform. One of the real possibilities seems to be the so-called Multirole Tanker Transport. In this case, obtaining the ability to refuel in the air and fast strategic transport in favorable conditions, extended by medical evacuation, seems to be a prerequisite for the optimal use of the F-35 combat aircraft and matching domestic capabilities to the challenges of modern warfare. The article aims to analyze the needs in this area and evaluate the multinational programs of this type operating in NATO and the European Union, through the prism of the participation of the Polish Air Force in them.

Niższościowe pragnienie zemsty i jego rola w kształtowaniu się osobowości o charakterze przemocowym

abstracts.content: Resentyment to kompleks nienawistnych emocji (zawiści, zazdrości, pragnienia odwetu) powstałych na bazie odczucia gorszości. Jako taki nie jest on udziałem wszystkich ludzi, a jedynie tych nieradzących sobie z wyzwaniami, które stawia przed nimi rzeczywistość. Fakt, że nie mogą się z nią w satysfakcjonujący sposób uporać, budzi frustracje, która wtórnie prowadzi do agresji. W skrajnych formach agresja może przybierać postać ataków wobec tych, którzy są przez resentymentalny podmiot identyfikowani jako przyczyna domniemanych życiowych niepowodzeń. Zasadniczym celem niniejszego artykułu jest analiza fenomenu ressentimentalnej agresji, czyli takiej, której bazą emocjonalną jest uczucie gorszości. Pragnę ponadto ustalić, czy i w jakim zakresie można podjąć skuteczną próbę eliminacji resentymentu z życia społecznego, a przynajmniej znacząco go ograniczyć.

Ressentiment is a complex of hateful emotions (envy, jealousy, desire for revenge) created on the basis of a feeling of inferiority. As such, it does not affect all people, but only those who cannot cope with the challenges that reality poses to them. The fact that they cannot deal with it in a satisfactory way arouses frustration, which secondarily leads to aggression. In extreme forms, aggression can take the form of attacks against those who are identified by the ressentimental subject as the cause of alleged life failures. The main goal of this article is to analyze the phenomenon of ressentimental aggression, i.e. aggression whose emotional basis is a feeling of inferiority. I also want to determine whether and to what extent an effective attempt can be made to eliminate ressentiment from social life, or at least to significantly reduce it.

title: Użycie lotnictwa sił powietrznych w początkach konfliktu syryjskiego. Geneza konfliktu oraz wnioski użycia lotnictwa

otherTitles.title: The use of Air Force aviation in the early days of the Syrian conflict. The origins of the conflict and the conclusions of the use of aviation

abstracts.content: Użycie lotnictwa we współczesnych konfliktach zbrojnych stanowi podstawę do działania dla pozostałych rodzajów wojsk działających w ramach danych sił zbrojnych, czy też wojsk w systemie sojuszniczym. Konflikt syryjski pokazał, że spór mający wydawać by się mogło charakter lokalny, ma jednak wiele płaszczyzn i krzyżują się w nim interesy wielkich mocarstw. Odnosząc się do niedawnych wydarzeń, analizując użycie lotnictwa krajów takich jak Syria, Federacja Rosyjska czy Stany Zjednoczone Ameryki Północnej, można wyciągnąć wnioski i wyznaczyć trendy zastosowania lotnictwa w konfliktach mogących się wydarzyć w ciągu najbliższych dwóch dekad. W rozdziale przedstawiono genezę konfliktu syryjskiego. Opisano poszczególne państwa i czynniki, które spowodowały, że kraje takie jak Rosja i Stany Zjednoczone zaangażowały się militarnie w Syrii. Dokonano rzetelnej analizy faktograficznej dotyczącej przyczyn wybuchu konfliktu, użycia w nim lotnictwa sił powietrznych oraz sposobów walki taktyki lotniczej oraz wykorzystania statków powietrznych w konflikcie o charakterze wielopłaszczyznowym. Dodatkowym atutem opracowania jest wykorzystanie materiału ikonograficznego.

The use of aviation in contemporary armed conflicts provides the basis for action for the other types of troops operating within the armed forces concerned or troops in the allied system. The Syrian conflict has shown that the seemingly localised nature of the conflict is nevertheless multifaceted and the interests of great powers intersect. Referring to recent events, analysing the use of aviation of countries such as Syria, the Russian Federation or the United States of America, it is possible to draw conclusions and set trends for the use of aviation in conflicts likely to occur in the next two decades. This article presents the genesis of the Syrian conflict. It describes the various states and the factors that led countries such as Russia and the United States to become militarily involved in Syria. A sound factual analysis has been made of the causes of the outbreak of the conflict, the use of air power aviation in the conflict and the means of fighting, air tactics and the use of aircraft in a multifaceted conflict. An additional strength of the study is the use of iconographic material.

book.title: Wybrane aspekty zastosowania bojowego lotnictwa. T. 5

title: Maternal knowledge of pediatric first aid in Riyadh: Addressing gaps for improved child safety and women’s health outcomes

abstracts.content: Childhood injuries are a major cause of morbidity and mortality worldwide, with mothers often being the first responders in such emergencies. In Saudi Arabia, despite high educational attainment, maternal preparedness for pediatric first aid remains underexplored. This study aims to evaluate maternal knowledge, attitudes, and practices (KAP) concerning pediatric first aid in Riyadh, with a focus on identifying key gaps and informing interventions in line with Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030. This descriptive cross-sectional study surveyed 385 mothers residing in Riyadh between May and September 2023. Data were collected through a structured and validated questionnaire available in Arabic and English, distributed via social media platforms. The questionnaire assessed socio-demographic characteristics, knowledge, attitudes, and practices regarding pediatric first aid. Statistical analysis was conducted using SPSS version 23, with descriptive statistics and non-parametric tests (Mann–Whitney U and Kruskal–Wallis) employed to analyze group differences. The reliability of the instruments was measured using Cronbach’s alpha (α = 0.867). The majority of mothers (69.2%) were aged between 20 and 40 years, and 66.1% held a university degree. While 97.4% of the respondents reported being aware of first aid, significant gaps in knowledge were observed. Although 76.8% of the participants knew how to apply pressure to a bleeding wound, only 42.3% correctly identified how to preserve a lost tooth, and just 12.3% knew the appropriate response to seizures. Mothers with formal first aid training had significantly higher knowledge scores (P < .01), and education level was a significant predictor of better knowledge (P < .05). Social media was the most frequently cited source of information (37.6%), followed by first aid training courses (27.4%). Despite high awareness, this study identifies substantial gaps in maternal knowledge of first aid for pediatric emergencies, particularly in managing specific situations such as seizures and dental injuries. These findings highlight the urgent need for structured first aid training programs tailored to mothers in Riyadh. Incorporating first aid education into Saudi Arabia’s public health initiatives, particularly Vision 2030, could significantly improve maternal preparedness and enhance child safety

title: Predictors of post-traumatic stress disorder among healthcare workers during the COVID-19 pandemic in Poland

abstracts.content: The COVID-19 pandemic has significantly impacted the mental health of healthcare workers globally. Given the critical role these professionals play, understanding the prevalence and predictors of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) among healthcare workers is crucial for developing targeted interventions. Comprehensive data on the predictors of PTSD symptoms within this population remain limited. This cross-sectional study surveyed 852 healthcare workers across 4 Polish regions between 2021 and 2022. Data were collected using the Post-traumatic Stress Disorder Checklist–Civilian Version (PCL-C), which was culturally adapted and validated for Polish respondents. To identify key predictors of PTSD symptoms, researchers employed various statistical methods: Descriptive Statistics summarized key variables (e.g. age, job tenure) to provide an overview of data distribution and sample characteristics. Pearson Correlations examined linear relationships among variables like age, work experience, and PTSD severity, ensuring no multicollinearity through variance inflation factor checks. t-Tests and Mann–Whitney U tests compared PTSD symptom severity across demographic and professional subgroups, accounting for normality using the Kolmogorov–Smirnov test. And Hierarchical Regression Analysis identified significant predictors, incorporating demographic factors first and work-related variables (e.g. fear for personal health) in a second step. A total of 88.1% of participants were female, and 82.6% were nurses. The overall prevalence of PTSD symptoms was high, with a mean total PTSD score of 37.87. Gender differences were significant, with women reporting higher scores across the PTSD subscales, including avoidance and hyperarousal. Nurses had significantly higher intrusion symptoms compared to other professionals. Fear for personal health was the strongest predictor of PTSD symptoms (β = 0.15, P < .001), explaining 11% of the variance in the final regression model (R 2 = 0.11, P < .001). The findings underscore the urgent need for targeted mental health interventions, particularly for women and nurses, who are disproportionately affected by PTSD during the pandemic. Predictive models should guide the development of support programs to mitigate the long-term psychological impact of COVID-19 and ensure better preparedness for future pandemics. The significant influence of fear for personal health on PTSD outcomes highlights the importance of protective measures and psychological support for frontline healthcare workers.

title: The impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on hypertension management in southeastern Poland: Challenges and adaptations for emergency medical teams

abstracts.content: The coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic introduced unprecedented challenges to healthcare systems, disrupting the management of chronic conditions such as hypertension. This study examines the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on hypertension management by emergency medical teams (EMTs) in southeastern Poland. A retrospective analysis was conducted using medical emergency activity cards from EMTs in southeastern Poland. The study included 1795 cases of primary hypertension (International Classification of Diseases, 10th Edition: I-10), comparing data from the pre-pandemic period (April 1, 2019–March 31, 2020) to the pandemic period (April 1, 2020–March 31, 2021). Demographic characteristics, blood pressure measurements, pharmacological interventions, and transport decisions were analyzed using Chi-square tests for categorical variables and t-tests for continuous variables. The frequency of hypertension-related emergency calls remained stable between the pre-pandemic and pandemic periods (P = .805). Women accounted for 68.6% (N = 1232) of cases, and the mean age of patients was 63.4 years (SD = 15.2), with no significant age or sex differences between the 2 periods. The mean initial systolic blood pressure (SBP) was significantly higher before the pandemic (189.85 mm Hg) compared to during the pandemic (185.57 mm Hg, P < .001). The proportion of patients with severe hypertension (SBP ≥ 180 mm Hg) decreased from 70.7% to 66.1%, while mild hypertension cases increased from 5.3% to 7.1% (P = .046). The administration of hydroxyzine increased significantly (38.2% vs 45.1%, P = .003), reflecting a greater focus on managing anxiety-related symptoms. Additionally, EMTs treated more patients at the scene rather than transporting them to the emergency department (76.1% vs 62.4%, P < .001), indicating a shift in EMT decision-making to reduce hospital exposure and optimize resource allocation. The COVID-19 pandemic significantly altered the prehospital management of hypertension, leading to lower initial SBP readings, increased anxiolytic use, and reduced hospital transport rates. Age and sex distribution remained stable across both periods. These findings highlight the need for flexible emergency response protocols that integrate mental health considerations and enhance on-site hypertension management. Future research should assess the long-term outcomes of these adaptations and explore strategies to improve prehospital hypertension care in future public health emergencies.

title: Potrzeba utworzenia nowego lotniska wojskowego w Białymstoku

abstracts.content: Polskie Siły Powietrzne potrzebują nowego lotniska wojskowego. Wynika to z warunków operacyjnych i modernizacyjnych, ilościowego wzrostu lotnictwa wojskowego oraz współpracy międzynarodowej w ramach NATO. Dobrą lokalizacją do jego powstania jest Białystok - dzielnica Dojlidy (na bazie istniejącego lotniska o powierzchni 400 ha). Od decyzji o lokalizacji potrzeba dwóch i pół roku na wybudowanie podstawowej infrastruktury (ogrodzenie, wartownia, pas, wieża, hangary, warsztaty, magazyny, obiekty szkoleniowe, budynki dowództwa, internat, szpital, drogi wewnętrzne, stołówka, klub). Oprócz ww. wymienionych inwestycji wielkoskalowych potrzebny jest podstawowy sprzęt i pojazdy. Łącznie koszt takiego projektu można szacować na 1,5 mld zł (wg cen z 2023 r.). Taka inwestycja pobudziłaby lokalny rozwój społeczno-gospodarczy, zatrudniając w trakcie budowy około 800 pracowników, a docelowo pracę lub usługi znalazłoby tam około 400 osób

book.title: Ocena aktualnych aspektów przebiegu wojny w Ukrainie oraz możliwe scenariusze perspektywicznych działań operacyjnych, w celu realizacji zasadniczych założeń polityczno-imperialnych Rosji

title: Analysis of the basic aerodynamic characteristics of an unmanned combat aerial vehicle based on a CAD model

abstracts.content: This paper presents an overview of selected unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) designs to show the development of unmanned aircraft. In this context, the paper describes the application of CAD design in creating a 3D model in order to perform basic aerodynamic CFD simulations. The IAI Heron was selected for geometry modelling. Based on digital analyses of publicly available design materials and photographs, simplified models of the selected structure were created using the SolidWorks software. Basic aerodynamic characteristics of the developed geometric model of the AIA Heron were obtained by calculations made with ANSYS Fluent. The paper analyses the results obtained and compares them to data in the literature for a similar class of UAV. The prepared model will serve as a basis for future 3D prints. The developed CFD numerical model will be used for further comparative analysis and validation in wind tunnel tests.
